attributes.action: Investigation into terrorist attacks planned from within British mentored Afghan prisons and to stop the torture of British and Commonwealth citizens.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned respectfully request an official investigation into what has been happening within prisons in Afghanistan.

British and American soldiers have been killed in over 200 terrorist IED attacks - planned and ordered from within British Embassy mentored Afghan prisons.

Former British and Commonwealth soldiers have also been ill-treated and tortured by Afghan authorities under the full knowledge of the British Embassy Kabul and the Foreign and Commonwealth Office for many years.

We request that David Cameron launches an official independent investigation into the above points.

The objective is for the Foreign and Commonwealth Office to be held accountable and to help save future British and American lives.
